You are here: Home1 / About Us

Our Story


Welcome to PAS (Professional Amazon Services)! Since 2021, we have been dedicated to providing specialized e-commerce support and management services. Our mission is to partner with brands, organizations, and individuals, helping them launch and expand their e-commerce businesses on Amazon and other leading e-marketplaces.
Our Approach
At PAS, we operate as a remote e-commerce department for our partners. This means we seamlessly integrate with your existing procedures, becoming an extension of your team. By leveraging the latest technology and industry best practices, we deliver comprehensive services, expert staff, and efficient processes to ensure your e-commerce success.



Why Choose US?

ExpertiseWith years of experience in the e-commerce industry, we have the knowledge and skills to help you succeed.

Comprehensive ServicesFrom account setup to marketing and beyond, we offer a full suite of services to support your e-commerce journey.

Personalized SolutionsWe understand that every business is unique. Our solutions are tailored to meet your specific needs and objectives.

Proven ResultsOur track record speaks for itself. We have helped numerous clients achieve their e-commerce goals and grow their businesses.

Cost-EffectiveThe business’s bottom line is essential, especially with Amazon’s increasing fees, inflation, and rising logistics costs. That’s why PAS brings affordable and high-quality service packages, ensuring you get the best value for your investment.




Our Values






Mission
Our mission is to democratize e-commerce by offering seamless, efficient, and affordable remote solutions. By partnering with brands, organizations, and individuals, we are committed to streamlining their e-commerce operations, ensuring they not only meet but exceed their digital marketplace goals.


Vision
Empowering brands, organizations, and individuals by pioneering as a dedicated remote e-commerce hub, driving their aspirations to e-commerce success with unmatched efficiency and affordability.


Values
At the core of our identity are strong team and communications. We create opportunities to meet our partners and sign agreements by providing them the best we have.
